Want to be part of the special occasion, then press the button below and start sharing your experience.

In the journey of life you come across someone who stays, someone who becomes your meaning and the answer to life\'s most persistent problems. When a scientist met a marine, God was happy and he knew that what he couldn\'t define, they would.

Committing our hearts is the most beautiful feeling in the world. People often look for reasons to get engaged. We found comfort in each other\'s arms and cheer to be husband and wife as we take our vows soon with the blessing of the almighty. For the tree of a happy married life our engagement is the first seed. Union of two hearts.
Harsh\nMD in Real Plastic Company Limited
Dixita\nTravelling, reading, partying and listening to music.

Harsh\nA package of smart, witty and warm, Harsh is the ideal husband material. His smile brightens up a room and his infectious hugs magically make things better. It isn\'t a surprise then that Harsh is often referred to as the \'friend magnet\'. A man filled with knowledge so deep, he could strike a conversation with almost anyone. What makes Harsh complete is his faith and devotion to his God and his family, which is a quality rare to find.

Dixita\nDixita is a mix of poise and elegance. She is beautiful, subtly bold and sweetly docile. She absorbs the heat around her and make us feel like world is still a stable and good place. A shy singer, passionate researcher.....she has some magic up her sleeves. A wonderful daughter and sister, she is now up for exciting innings as a wife. We wish her very best in the new journey.
Message from Elders: \n\nMarriage is the alliance of togetherness of two bodies mind and soul.
Friday, 24th February, 2017\n\nApproximate temperature would be 35\u00B0 during the day and 24\u00B0 in the night.
Saturday, 25th February, 2017\n\nApproximate temperature would be 36\u00B0 during the day and 23\u00B0 in the night.
Sunday, 26th February, 2017\n\nApproximate temperature would be 35\u00B0 during the day and 24\u00B0 in the night.
Friday, 27th February, 2017\n\nApproximate temperature would be 35\u00B0 during the day and 24\u00B0 in the night.

Harsh\nI would like to see her blossom in her career and family life. Every phase of her memory should be enlightened with the presence of near and dear ones. Dream of coming back to our home town after experiencing the world is my final goal in life. A journey of a thousand miles starts with a single step. I vow to lead her with love and happiness. There is old sailors saying \'A ship in harbor is safe, but that is not what ships are built for\'. Life is unpredictable. I feel confident that you will be a part in our sadness, sacrifices, downfalls and hard time
Dixita\nI Vow to walk with you in all thick and thins of life and to back you in your personal and professional life. I simply want to see you happy and embrace each moment of life with you.
